title: Into Reference!
author: verias
text:
So, chibis return with a smidge of Trekkie humor!

And more snow....and trudging in the cold. I get cold just thinking about it, and it's friggin near 100 degrees here.

So, what about you guys? How's the weather, and what's your favorite season? J'll be back from vacation here soon!

Keith

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: ahh summer, low-90s with a humidity anywhere from 30-100%. And people wonder why I prefer Fall

replies.author: JD
replies.text:
I'd love some snow, mostly because the unattainable is more desirable.
So far this summer it's been well over 120f, but it's cooling down now.


Last edited by JD
Edited 1 time(s).

replies.author: Sario528*Guest*
replies.text: I'd say fall is probably my favorite season, but unfortunately it only lasts for about a week at most around here.

replies.author: Lukkai*Guest*
replies.text:
I like all the seasons, but my favourite is spring.

And we've had the hottest July and August for a long time. And finally this weekend a few cooler days and, more importantly, nights.

replies.author: Sario528*Guest*
replies.text: Hey Keith, do you have a twitter?

replies.author: Musical_life*Guest*
replies.text: Anyone else notice that Chibi-Theresa is wearing a red shirt...? Are you trying to tell us something, guys?
